params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\" as \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\" as \\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MAX_PERIOD\\" as \\"MAX_PERIOD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_STOCK\\" as \\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"MIN_CAL_DATE\\", " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"MAX_CAL_DATE\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL " +"where " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = ( " +" select " +" M_PLANT.\\"CAL_NO\\" as \\"CAL_NO\\" " +" from " +" M_PLANT " +" where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" )"

"SELECT " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN1.EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD, " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_OD1.DUE_DATE), " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD1.DM_QTY, 'fm99999999999990.0999'), " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_OD2.ODR_START_DATE), " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN1.OD_NO, " +" T_OD1.MODIFY_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN T_EXTERNAL_PLAN1, " +" T_OD T_OD1, " +" T_OD T_OD2 " +"WHERE " +" T_OD1.OD_NO = T_EXTERNAL_PLAN1.OD_NO " +" and T_OD2.OD_NO(+) = T_OD1.PARENT_OD_NO " +" and T_EXTERNAL_PLAN1.EXTERNAL_PLAN_REG_TYP = 1 " +" and T_OD1.OD_TYP = 3 " +" and T_OD1.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_OD1.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and(T_OD1.DUE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) " +"ORDER BY " +" T_OD1.DUE_DATE ASC"

"update " +" T_OD " +"set " +" \\"PS_EDITION\\" = null, " +" \\"PS_LT_FLG\\" = 0, " +" \\"PS_FIXED_LT\\" = 0, " +" \\"PS_PROP_LT\\" = 0, " +" \\"PS_PROP_LOT_SIZE\\" = 0, " +" \\"PS_UNIT_QTY\\" = 0, " +" \\"PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\" = 1, " +" \\"PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\" = 0, " +" \\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" = null, " +" \\"PS_SPOIL\\" = 0, " +" \\"CONS_TYP\\" = 0, " +" \\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" = null, " +" \\"EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE\\" = null " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" T_OD1.JOB_ODR_CD, " +" T_OD1.ITEM_CD, " +" M_ITEM1.ITEM_NAME, " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_OD1.ODR_START_DATE), " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_OD1.PRD_START_DATE), " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_OD1.PRD_DUE_DATE), " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD1.ODR_QTY, 'fm99999999999990.0999'), " +" TO_CHAR(M_PS1.PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR, 'fm99999999999990.0999'), " +" TO_CHAR(M_PS1.PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR, 'fm99999999999990.0999'), " +" T_OD1.OD_NO, " +" T_OD1.MODIFY_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_OD T_OD1, " +" M_PS M_PS1, " +" M_ITEM M_ITEM1 " +"WHERE " +" T_OD1.ITEM_CD = M_PS1.PARENT_ITEM_CD " +" and T_OD1.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM1.ITEM_CD " +" and M_PS1.COMP_ITEM_CD = ? " +" and T_OD1.OD_TYP IN (1, 2) " +" and T_OD1.ODR_RELEASE_FLG = 0 " +" and M_PS1.MRP_EXP_TYP = 0 " +" and(T_OD1.ODR_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) " +" and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') BETWEEN M_PS1.EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE AND M_PS1.EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE " +" and T_OD1.PLANT_CD = ? " +"ORDER BY " +" T_OD1.ODR_START_DATE ASC, " +" T_OD1.ITEM_CD ASC"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_OD1.DM_QTY), 'TM9') " +"FROM " +" T_OD T_OD1, " +" T_OD T_OD2 " +"WHERE " +" T_OD1.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and T_OD2.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and T_OD2.OD_NO = ? " +" and T_OD1.PARENT_OD_NO = T_OD2.OD_NO"

"SELECT " +" PS_EDITION, " +" PS_LT_FLG, " +" PS_FIXED_LT, " +" PS_PROP_LT, " +" PS_PROP_LOT_SIZE, " +" PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR, " +" PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR, " +" PS_SPOIL, " +" CONS_TYP, " +" TO_CHAR(EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), " +" TO_CHAR(EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') " +"FROM " +" M_PS " +"WHERE " +" PARENT_ITEM_CD = ? " +" and COMP_ITEM_CD = ? " +" and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') BETWEEN M_PS.EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE AND M_PS.EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE " +"ORDER BY " +" M_PS.PS_EDITION ASC " +""

"SELECT " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") AS \\"MIN_CAL_DATE\\", " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") AS \\"MAX_CAL_DATE\\" " +"FROM " +" M_CAL " +"WHERE " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = ( " +" SELECT " +" M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" AS \\"CAL_NO\\" " +" FROM " +" M_ITEM " +" WHERE " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" )"

"SELECT " +" COUNT(1) " +"FROM " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN T_EXTERNAL_PLAN1, " +" T_OD T_OD1, " +" T_OD T_OD2 " +"WHERE " +" T_OD1.OD_NO = T_EXTERNAL_PLAN1.OD_NO " +" and T_OD2.OD_NO(+) = T_OD1.PARENT_OD_NO " +" and T_EXTERNAL_PLAN1.EXTERNAL_PLAN_REG_TYP = 1 " +" and T_OD1.OD_TYP = 3 " +" and T_OD1.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_OD1.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and(T_OD1.DUE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) " +" and ROWNUM <= NVL(TO_NUMBER(?), ROWNUM) + 1"

"SELECT " +" COUNT(1) " +"FROM " +" T_OD T_OD1, " +" M_PS M_PS1, " +" M_ITEM M_ITEM1 " +"WHERE " +" T_OD1.ITEM_CD = M_PS1.PARENT_ITEM_CD " +" and T_OD1.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM1.ITEM_CD " +" and M_PS1.COMP_ITEM_CD = ? " +" and T_OD1.OD_TYP IN (1, 2) " +" and T_OD1.ODR_RELEASE_FLG = 0 " +" and M_PS1.MRP_EXP_TYP = 0 " +" and(T_OD1.ODR_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) " +" and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') BETWEEN M_PS1.EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE AND M_PS1.EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE " +" and T_OD1.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and ROWNUM <= NVL(TO_NUMBER(?), ROWNUM) + 1"
